title: EbSynth - Transform Video by Painting Over a Single Frame
introduction: EbSynth is a video synthesis tool that allows users to create artistic effects in videos by painting keyframes and generating output sequences.
features: Mapping for controlling output strokes location
Export to After Effects for easy composition
Support for transparent backgrounds and alpha masks
Tips for lighting, costumes, format, and layers for better results
hasFreeTrial: Yes, the beta version is free for commercial use
pricing: The beta version is free for commercial use, while the final professional version will be paid

faqs.question: How can I fix leakage out of the alpha borders when painting keyframes?
faqs.answer: You can match the painting with the reference frame or use an alpha mask sequence in the EbSynth GUI.

faqs.question: What should I do if EbSynth crashes unexpectedly?
faqs.answer: Check input file names and ensure numbers have 9 digits tops. Contact support if the issue persists.

faqs.question: How can I convert video files to image sequences for EbSynth Beta?
faqs.answer: You need to convert videos to image sequences (png or jpg) first. Various tools and software can help with this conversion process.
